verses.text: \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* loved, because \w the|strong="H3318"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H3478"\w* hear \w the|strong="H3318"\w* voice \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* prayer.

Because \w he|strong="H3478"\w* hath inclined \w his|strong="H1961"\w* ear unto \w me|strong="H1961"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* days \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* call \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* sorrows \w of|strong="H3220"\w* death \w have|strong="H7200"\w* encompassed \w me|strong="H7200"\w*: \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* perils \w of|strong="H3220"\w* hell \w have|strong="H7200"\w* found \w me|strong="H7200"\w*. \w I|strong="H7200"\w* met \w with|strong="H3220"\w* trouble \w and|strong="H7200"\w* sorrow:
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* called upon \w the|strong="H1121"\w* name \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Lord. O Lord, deliver my soul.
\w The|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H4100"\w* merciful \w and|strong="H3220"\w* just, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* God sheweth mercy.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* keeper \w of|strong="H1121"\w* little \w ones|strong="H1121"\w*: \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* little \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* delivered \w me|strong="H1121"\w*.

Turn, O \w my|strong="H3290"\w* soul, \w into|strong="H0776"\w* thy rest: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* hath \w been|strong="H0776"\w* bountiful \w to|strong="H0776"\w* thee.
\w For|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H4325"\w* hath delivered my soul \w from|strong="H4325"\w* death: my eyes \w from|strong="H4325"\w* tears, my feet \w from|strong="H4325"\w* falling.
I will please the Lord in the land of the living.
